segments.text: Ugh, the sink in this kitchen is a total disaster, water gushing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is blindly drying her plate while the mess spreads.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's gross, soaking her shoe and the floor like filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets dripping wet— what a nasty waste of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks clean, making the inside seem even dirtier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids climbing for cookies— the boy's stool is filthy with risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into the jar like that, probably getting crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out, begging— it's all so sneaky and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked, waiting to be dirtied by this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets exposing the cookie jar— inviting more mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel bunched around the plate looks soggy already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the sloppiness of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
